verbose_text: In addition, mCherry was partially extinguished in the HFF (XREF_FIG, Day0) and over time we observed an increase in mCherry expression (XREF_FIG, Days 7, 14, 21, and 28), presumably reflecting loss of miR-155 which is expressed only in the latest stages of differentiation and not in cells with characteristics of pluripotent stem cells XREF_BIBR.
